features: Infants and toddlers will have fun “working” just like grown-ups do and discovering textures and sounds with a wooden desktop activity board with all attached pieces and a built-in handle
Open the laptop lid to reveal a peekaboo mirror (babies love faces!) and rubberized, shaped keyboard buttons to touch and press to help develop fine motor and shape recognition skills
Spin the rolling contact list to hear beads inside tumble, spin the wooden pencil, slide the wooden mouse, and flip mug insert for hot chocolate or juice; no loose pieces, great for travel
Melissa & Doug infant and toddler toys inspire “a-ha!” moments of discovery. Adorable, diverse characters and a variety of fun shapes and textures encourage exploratory, skill-building play

Makes a great gift for infants, ages 12 months to two years, for hands-on, screen-free play and developmental skill-building; product made with FSC-certified materials that support responsible forestry; applies to new inventory only (FSC C156584)
body.description: It’s never been so much fun for one-year-olds to “get to work” on developmental skills! Infants and toddlers will love playing with this wooden version of a laptop and desk just like grown-ups do! Open the screen to reveal a peekaboo mirror to tap into babies’ fascination with faces. Rubberized keyboard buttons are fun to press and help kids develop fine motor skills and shape recognition. Spin the rolling contact list to hear the beads inside tumble. Turn the wooden pencil and slide the adorable mouse-shaped mouse in its track! Flip the top of the attached mug to choose hot chocolate or juice artwork. With a built-in carrying handle and no loose pieces, the sturdy wooden activity board is great for travel and families on the go. This Melissa & Doug learning toy is an engaging way to encourage face-relevant stimuli and to help infants 12 months and older develop important sensory and fine motor skills. Melissa & Doug infant and toddler toys inspire “a-ha!” moments of discovery. Adorable, diverse characters and a variety of fun shapes and textures encourage exploratory, skill-building play. This product is certified by the Forest Stewardship Council. FSC certification ensures that products come from responsibly managed forests that provide environmental, social, and economic benefits, and that forests are protected for future generations. Please note that FSC certification applies to new inventory only (FSC C156584).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Countless Ways to Play From classic wooden toys to realistic pretend play sets, Melissa & Doug products spark imagination and wonder through screen-free, open-ended play! We make well-crafted toys that are developed with care to be passed down from generation to generation or shared family to family. When kids pretend with Melissa & Doug, anything is possible!

Opportunities for Discovery Children will discover textures and sounds with a wooden desktop activity board with all attached pieces and a built-in handle. Peekaboo Mirror Open the laptop lid to reveal a peekaboo mirror! Engaging Travel Toy Children will spin to hear beads inside tumble and slide the wooden mouse. No loose pieces make it great for travel.

With more than three decades of experience, we’re a brand you can trust. Our safe and durable toys inspire imaginative play and are designed to stand the test of time and be passed down through generations. We use wood whenever we can because it’s renewable and durable. To ensure the world has healthy forests AND high-quality wooden toys, we’ve committed to planting 10 million trees by 2030. 100% Screen-Free No screens, no apps, just good wholesome toys for hours of kid-powered fun! Each one of our products is designed to engage children in the joy of imaginative, hands-on play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and entertaining
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this toy is amazing. Everything looks very nice, bright, and engaging. My 1 year old got this for her birthday, it’s a great way for her to learn to use her hands in more ways as well as get some sensory regulation. My other child is almost 3 and might like this you even more than the younger one. They both are very interested in flipping the laptop open, changing the drink back and forth as well as turning the little people wheel. Overall, this is a great development toy and the perfect size for car rides, high chair play, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the work-from-home toddler.
reviews.reviewText: My 2 year old likes to start her morning with a warm cup of coffee before she dives into her busy day. Whether she is spinning through her rolodex, scribbling on post it notes or warming up that mouse - she is ready to work beside mommy!My girl is at a stage where she loves to imitate me so we decided this would be a great holiday gift for her (alongside a toy kcup machine). It is doing a pretty good job from keeping her banging on my laptop.It is pretty solid, so when she plays with the different pieces it doesn't flip up. All the items on the desk are in place very well, I don't have to worry about her tearing anything off.It keeps her attention pretty well and offers different sensory experiences. The rolodex spins and the cup (attached to the table) flips between cocoa and orange juice. The mouse makes clicking noises as it moves and the keyboard is semi-squishy.I wish I bought this when she was younger, because some of these features are aimed for younger kids but I feel she still gets alot of fun out of it now for pretend play. We are hoping to put off getting her something like a tablet to limit screen time (but ofcourse my husband is playing a game in the backround of the picture haha).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Travel!
reviews.reviewText: Got this as a gift for my little one’s first birthday. It has been an instant hit with her! As other reviews have mentioned, there is some visible glue around the mirror attachment, but it is otherwise adorable. She loves to play with it in her high chair, and it keeps her entertained on road trips. LOVE!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Melissa and Doug quality (and price)
reviews.reviewText: As I've stated in other Melissa and Doug toys, the quality and attention to detail is great. These are the types of toys that will last a lifetime and definitely hold up to a child's abuse. That said, for what they are, the toys are a bit on the expensive side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my almost 1year old daughter as she has a huge interest in my laptop when I am doing school work. She now sits next to me on her own computer and the mirror for the screen is an added bonus because she LOVES looking at herself. Easy to slide gadgets, soft keyboard rubber.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My baby doesn’t adore it but they will fidget with it for a few minutes at a time. My only complaint is the visible glue!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality like many Melissa and Doug toys

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've never seen something like this before and I think it's awesome. Made from good materials that are really easy to wash and wipe clean, after being used by sticky fingers.My little one is a little to young to use this to its full potential atm, but he does enjoy playing with it and banging it with his hands. He especially likes looking at himself on the reflective "screen".Thanks to the quality, this will definitely last and grow as he does.

Das Spielzeug macht einen stabilen und hochwertigen Eindruck. Es ist einem Arbeitsplatz mit Laptop, Maus und Kaffee nachempfunden. Das Spielzeug bietet verschiedene Möglichkeiten zum Drehen, Klappen, Schieben und Drücken und wird von einem ca. 2 Jahren alten Kind schnell in Beschlag genommen. Leider fand das Kind das Spielzeug aber auch recht schnell langweilig. Für den eher kurzen Spielspaß ohne großen Wiederholungsfaktor ist das Ganze dann recht teuer. Alles in allem vergebe ich daher 4 von 5 möglichen Sternen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Little laptop desktop for your toddler
reviews.reviewText: Melissa & Doug Wooden work & play desktop activity board infant and toddler toy, Early development & activity toys, Wooden baby sensory toy for 12 months plus, Gift for baby girl & baby boy is currently at the price of £27.99, and if you are a prime member, that includes next-day delivery and 30 days returns if anything goes wrong with the item.Its a very cute wooden toy, to get for your child, especially when you work from home, so your baby can have their own desktop station to play with and they will not be trying to get to your laptop etcThe toy is very well made from very good quality wood, that has smooth surfaces with no sharp edges or any splinters, so you don’t have to worry that your child will get hurt. The little wooden “laptop” when opened stays up, so you don’t have to worry, it will slam on your child's fingers.On top of that, the other pieces on the board can be moved and twisted, which makes it a very nice sensory toy.All in all a great choice and I can highly recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: So cute! Little laptop desk good babies to explore.
reviews.reviewText: I love this, it is so cute and nicely designed. It’s basically a glorified version of a baby’s tummy time mirror but fitted into the middle of the ‘mini -office’.In the centre of the desk is the laptop which folds up and down. The laptop ‘screen’ is a mirror and the keyboard are soft silicon squishable shapes for little fingers to press. Around the outside are a cup, a mouse, a pencil and a Rolodex. The cup has a disc you can switch to change from coffee to orange juice. The mouse has a mouse face painted on and makes a satisfying click nose as of slides along its tail. The pencil pivots to point to letters and numbers and the Rolodex wheel spins with different faces painted on it.It’s all really fun and bring msgs predominantly in wood will be durable and just had the wooden toy classy feel to it.I feel it is more for very young babies, around that tummy time/crawling and early walking period. Maybe as they get to be toddlers, they might be looking for something with a wide range of activities to do. But it is a really lovely toy.

Wir haben diesen Schreibtisch testen wollen, da die Mama auch öfter im Homeoffice ist und die Kids das gern nachspielen möchten.Auf diesem "Schreibtisch" ist alles vorhanden, was man so beim Arbeiten braucht. Ein Laptop mit geometrischen und weichen Tasten zum Drucken und einem spiegelndem Display. Es gibt eine bewegliche Maus dazu, welche schön laut rattert wenn man sie bewegt. Links auf dem Tisch liegt noch ein Stift, welchen man immer und immer wieder drehen kann. Und zu guter letzt gibt's noch eine Art Telefonbuch mit Gesichtern auf einer Rolle die man drehen kann.Das Brett und alle Komponenten sind super verarbeitet. Es geht nichts ab und das Brett lässt sich auch super auf lange Fahrten mitnehmen. Klare Kaufempfehlung von mir
